summary: A steel arrow that sends a shocking charge through the enemy.
descriptionHtml:
This is a re-placer arrow for the steel arrow, it has a long range and a shock effect. The reason it is so low charged is that all NPC carry these, I mean you don't want to get killed right away...do you. Wait DON'T leave check out my other arrow.

Enjoy
Chuck
